mapper.sql: id, trans_code, user_id, order_code, trans_type, trans_status, channel_id, trans_amount, cash_amount, total_cash_balance, award_flag, in_out, remark, create_time, update_time
mapper.select: SELECT t2.nickname account_name, lot_seed_name, lot_issue_no, content, award_number FROM lotto_order t1 INNER JOIN lotto_live_user t2 ON t1.account_id = t2.id WHERE t1.order_no=#{orderno}

SELECT t2.nickname AS createBy, t3.username AS TargetBy, t4.gift_name, t1.amount, t1.gift_num FROM lotto_trade_user_award t1 INNER JOIN lotto_live_user t2 ON t1.user_id = t2.id INNER JOIN lotto_host_user t3 ON t1.tv_user_id = t3.user_id INNER JOIN lotto_gift t4 ON t1.gift_id = t4.id WHERE t1.trans_code=#{orderno}

SELECT t1.*, t2.gift_num, t4.gift_name, t3.nickname FROM lotto_trade_trans_user t1 LEFT JOIN lotto_trade_user_award t2 ON t2.trans_code = t1.trans_code LEFT JOIN lotto_gift t4 ON t4.id = t2.gift_id LEFT JOIN lotto_live_user t3 ON t3.id = t2.tv_user_id WHERE t1.user_id = #{req.userId} AND t1.trans_type = 2 ORDER BY t1.create_time DESC /*LIMIT ${req.pageNum},${req.pageSize}*/

SELECT count(t1.id) FROM lotto_trade_trans_user t1 LEFT JOIN lotto_trade_user_award t2 ON t2.trans_code = t1.order_code LEFT JOIN lotto_gift t4 ON t4.id = t2.gift_id LEFT JOIN lotto_live_user t3 ON t3.id = t2.tv_user_id AND t1.trans_type = 2 WHERE t1.user_id = #{req.userId}
